item.title: Solo Everest Base Camp Trek, What to pack?
item.description: If you are planning to prepare to trek Everest Base Camp by yourself, then this article would help you to get a picture of what you might need to pack in your backpack. Packing proper equipment, clothing & quick energy foods will help you to do your trek bit smoothly. One more important thing, is this plan would fit for the people who are willing to trek solo (without a porter), so what you a
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
